22-017SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, July 28, 2022.A motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Gaines, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Rey Gonzales, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan, Morgan Wheeler and Keisha GainesAbsent: 3 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Jenny Novak and Coby Skye2.

22-018SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Fleet Services Bureau on Green Fleet and Sustainability Initiatives.Dan Berlenbach, Fleet Services Manager, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Dan Berlenbach, Fleet Services Manager, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Dan Berlenbach, Fleet Services Manager.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dan Berlenbach, Fleet Services Manager, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Dan Berlenbach, Fleet Services Manager.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Coffee, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Rey Gonzales, Coby Skye, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan, Morgan Wheeler and Keisha GainesAbsent: 2 - Donna Bergeron-Birge and Jenny Novak3.
